admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The principal objective of the Xiamen
            Port Project is to assist the Government in its efforts to
            improve operations, relieve congestion and increase the
            handling capacity of the ports subsector. The project
            includes developments at Xiamen port which consist of: (i)
            construction of one container berth, two multi-purpose
            berths capable of being converted to container berths as and
            when needed, and one coal berth, together with the necessary
            infrastructure; (ii) provision of the required cargo
            handling, communications, and environmental protection
            equipment; and (iii) provision of training and technical
            assistance for master planning, construction supervision,
            and implementation of an improvement action plan.
